caption.p: Cytotoxicity of C. zeylanicum Blume EO. (a) Hemolytic activity of the different concentrations of C. zeylanicum Blume EO on human red blood cells. (b) Percent PBMC viability after treatment with different concentrations of C. zeylanicum Blume EO. âˆ—Significant reduction in cell viability (Kruskal-Wallis test followed by Dunn's post hoc test, p < 0.05).
